Gubernur Lemhannas : Potensi Konflik Pasca Pilpres Telah Mereda
05 Nov 2019, 21:13 by syariful alam


Gubernur Lemhannas : Potensi Konflik Pasca Pilpres Telah Mereda

KBRN, Jakarta : Gubernur Lemhannas RI, Letjen TNI (Purn) Agus Widjojo, mengatakan, pemilihan Presiden dan Wakil Presiden, anggota DPR RI, DPD RI, DPRD Provinsi serta anggota DPRD Kota/Kabupaten tahun 2019 telah berakhir pada 1 Oktober 2019.Selain itu, kata Gubernur Lemhannas, anggota DPR RI dan DPD RI terpilih telah dilantik. Pada 20 Oktober 2019 di Gedung DPR RI juga diselenggarakan pelantikan Presiden dan Wakil Presiden terpilih.Menurutnya, pelaksanaan demokrasi di Indonesia pada tahun 2019 diangap menjadi momentum demokrasi Indonesia yang menuju lebih baik.Meski dengan metode pemilihan serentak dalam memilih Presiden dan Wakil Presiden, anggota DPR RI, DPRD Provinsi, DPRD Kota/Kabupaten, secara keseluruhan dapat dikatakan berjalan baik dan lancar.Pencapaian demokrasi ini menjadikan Indonesia, satu-satunya negara yang melaksanakan pemilihan Presiden dan Wakil Presiden, anggota DPR RI, DPD RI, DPRD Provinsi, DPRD Kota/Kabupaten secara serentak dengan sukses.Meski pada masa kampanye jelang pemilihan, lanjut Gubernur, masyarakat setempat terpecah menjadi dua kelompok politik yang menimbulkan potensi konflik perpecahan dan mengancam kerukunan di tengah masyarakat jelang pemilihan.Namun kini, konflik tersebut telah mereda seiring kontestasi para tokoh politik dengan sikap kenegarawanannya.Kontestasi para tokoh politik dengan sikap kenegarawanan mengadakan pertemuan yang menimbulkan ekses telah berakhirnya kontestasi politik yang dulu telah menimbulkan kontestasi politik yang dulu telah menimbulkan keresahan di tengah masyarakat.“Bahkan kini tokoh (Prabowo) yang dulu bersaing dalam kontestasi politik, kini bersatu untuk menjalankan pemerintahan, selama kontestasi politik pemilu 2019,” kata Gubernur Lemhannas dalam acara Forum Komunikasi Pimpinan Lemhannas RI dengan Pemimpin Redaksi Media Massa bersama Gubernur Lemhannas RI bertajuk “Sinergi Peran Lemhannas RI dan Media Massa dalam Menjaga Kerukunan Kehidupan Berbangsa dan Bernegara” di Ruang Konstitusi Gedung Trigatra Lt. 3 Lemhannas RI, Selasa (5/10/2019)Lalu, hingga saat ini sebagai salah satu lembaga pemerintah non Kementerian, Lemhannas RI, memiliki tanggung jawab moral untuk menjaga keutuhan NKRI melalui tugas dan fungsinya yaitu menyelenggarakan pendidikan penyiapan kader dan pemantapan pimpinan tingkat nasional.Pemantapan nilai-nilai kebangsaan yang terkandung dalam empat konsensus dasar bangsa turut berperan aktif dalam menciptkan situasi yang kondusif.“Bangsa Indonesia turut berperan aktif dalam menciptkana situasi yang kondusif.Namun, untuk mengawal demokrasi dan menjamin keutuhan NKRI.“Lemhannas RI menyadari tidak dapat berjuang sendiri tanpa peran komponen bangsa lainnya, selama ini Lemhannas telah menyuarakan kepada seluruh rakyat Indonesia,” demikian dikatakan Gubernur Lemhannas.

Governor of Lemhannas: Post-Presidential Election Potential Has Eased
05 Nov 2019, 21:13 by syariful nature


Governor of Lemhannas: Post-Presidential Election Potential Has Eased

KBRN, Jakarta: Governor of Lemhannas RI, Lt. Gen. (ret.) Agus Widjojo, said that the election of President and Vice President, members of DPR RI, DPD RI, Provincial DPRD and members of City / Regency DPRD in 2019 had ended on October 1, 2019. , said Governor Lemhannas, elected members of the Indonesian House of Representatives and Republic of Indonesia Regional Representative Council were inaugurated. On October 20, 2019 at the RI House of Representatives also held the inauguration of the elected President and Vice President. According to him, the implementation of democracy in Indonesia in 2019 was considered to be the momentum of Indonesia's democracy that was going better. Even though the method of simultaneous election in selecting the President and Vice President, members of the DPR RI, Provincial DPRD, City / Regency DPRD, as a whole can be said to be going well and smoothly. This achievement of democracy makes Indonesia, the only country that carries out the election of President and Vice President, members of DPR RI, DPD RI, Provincial DPRD, City DPRD / The district was simultaneously successful. Although during the campaign period leading up to the election, continued the Governor, the local community was divided into two political groups that gave rise to potential conflicting conflicts and threatened harmony among the people leading up to the election. But now, the conflict had subsided as the contestation of political leaders with attitude of statesmanship. Contestation of the figures politics with statesmanship held meetings that led to excesses which ended political contestations that had previously led to political contestations that had caused unrest in the community. "Even now the figure (Prabowo) who once competed in political contestation, now united to run the government, during the contestation 2019 election politics, "said the Governor of Lemhannas in the Communication Forum of the Indonesian National Defense Ministry and the Chief Editor of the Mass Media together with the Governor of the Republic of Indonesia National Defense entitled" Synergy of the Role of Indonesian National Resilience Institute and Mass Media in Maintaining the Harmony of National and State Life "in the Constitution Room of the Trigatra Building, Lt. 3 Lemhannas RI, Tuesday (5/10/2019) Then, until now as one of the non-ministerial government institutions, Lemhannas RI, has a moral responsibility to maintain the integrity of the Unitary Republic of Indonesia through its duties and functions, namely organizing cadre preparation education and strengthening of national level leaders The strengthening of national values contained in the four basic consensus of the nation has played an active role in creating a conducive situation. "The Indonesian nation has an active role in creating a conducive situation. However, to guard democracy and guarantee the integrity of the Unitary Republic of Indonesia." struggling alone without the role of other nation's components, so far Lemhannas has voiced out to all Indonesian people, "said Governor of Lemhannas.
